name: Praise The Run
description:
Navigate Solaire Ronson back to his favorite sungazing spot, down by the ocean. Avoid obstacles, while collecting coins and enjoying the scenery.

This game was made for the miniLD#72 game jam: http://ludumdare.com/compo/minild-72/?action=previ...

This is my 1st finished video game. All assets and the music, were created by me, except for the fonts, skybox (https://mgsvevo.wordpress.com/) and the ocean (unity standard asset).

Soundtrack: https://soundcloud.com/nikola-nesovanovic/simple-praise-the-run-extended
